name: Stutter Step
description:
This is Ludum Dare 34 compo entry

Stutter step is one-dimensional roguelike (and by roguelike i mean no graphics/sounds and your success being dependant solely on random factor like it should be).

Use mouse in menus.

Use 'left' and 'right' arrow keys to play (there is also in-game 'how to play' page with more details).

Your goal is to reach right side of the map through a path guarded by mobs.

I'm using Source Code Pro font licensed via SIF OFL.
